bboxes.reason: The temperature_dial is a physical dial with a knob, and the bounding box with index 3 primarily covers the knob of the dial, including the actionable area for user interaction.
Bounding box 6 encompasses the knob of the timer_dial, the primary interactive element for the timer functionality.
Bounding box 7 primarily covers the dial knob of the 'selector_dial' control element, adhering to the Dial Selection Criteria.
Bounding box 9 primarily covers the dial knob of the element 'function_dial,' aligning with the dial selection criteria.
